short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Never miss out on cash back again. With the button you’ll get cash back alerts while you shop, plus get coupons applied at checkout.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Activate cash back directly from 1,000+ stores while you shop online. With the USAA MemberShop® button browser extension you’ll:

🛍️ Get easy-to-activate reminders: The button lets you know when to activate and earn cash back as you shop at more than 1,000 stores.

💰 Enjoy savings at your fingertips: Shop savvier with coupon codes that are automatically applied at checkout.

⚖️ Compare cash back offers: Shop and earn with confidence thanks to Google search results that clearly display stores’ cash back offers.

💯    Always get the best price: The button comparison-shops for you, then lets you know if a product is available for the same price or less at another store that's also offering cash back. 

👀 See what else you can earn: Enjoy easy access to earning opportunities like extra cash back, bonus offers, and more.

❤️ Let the cash back you love come to you: Get the USAA MemberShop® button browser extension now and get rewarded every time you shop.

By installing the USAA MemberShop® button, you are agreeing to these terms & conditions: 
https://mall.usaa.com/eula____.htm

Privacy Policy: https://www.usaa.com/privacy
